headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Nordson (NDSN) Q4 Earnings
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Nordson (NDSN) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended October 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Nordson (NDSN) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: Nordson (NDSN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 7.34% and 1.52%, respectively, for the quarter ended October 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Nordson: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.59 per share. The maker of adhesives and industrial coatings posted revenue of $744.5 million in the period, also beating Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $733.3 million.

headline: Nordson (NASDAQ:NDSN) Surprises With Q3 Sales But Stock Drops
summary: Manufacturing company Nordson (NASDAQ:NDSN) reported Q3 CY2024 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 3.5% year on year to $744.5 million. On the other hand, next quarter’s revenue guidance of $635 million was less impressive, coming in 6.9% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.78 per share was 7.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Nordson Corporation Reports Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2024 Results
summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio, December 11, 2024--Nordson Corporation (Nasdaq: NDSN) today reported results for the fiscal fourth quarter ended October 31, 2024. Sales were $744 million, a 4% increase compared to the prior year’s fourth quarter sales of $719 million. The increase in fourth quarter 2024 sales included the favorable 6% impact of acquisitions and favorable currency translation of 1%, offset by an organic sales decrease of 3%.

raw.headline: Nordson Corporation Reports Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2024 Results

Sales were $744 million, a 4% increase compared to the prior year’s fourth quarter sales of $719 million. The increase in fourth quarter 2024 sales included the favorable 6% impact of acquisitions and favorable currency translation of 1%, offset by an organic sales decrease of 3%.

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Nordson Stock Ahead Of Q4 Earnings
summary: Nordson Corporation (NASDAQ:NDSN) will release earnings for its fourth quarter, after the closing bell on Wednesday, Dec. 11. Analysts expect the Westlake, Ohio-based company to report quarterly earnings at $2.59 per share — up from $2.46 per share in the year-ago period. Nordson projects to report quarterly revenue of $736.79 million, compared to $719.31 million a year earlier, according to Benzinga Pro.
